sentences.en: a refreshing and energizing fruit drink
sentences.cn: 提神并增加体能的果汁饮料

sentences.en: A refreshing breeze is blowing gently.
Ah, a long, cool , refreshing drink! Just what the doctor ordered!
sentences.cn: 哦, 一大杯清涼提神的饮料! 正是我想要的!

sentences.en: Cool drinks are refreshing on a hot day.
sentences.cn: 在热天喝冷饮使人感到清爽.

sentences.en: Herbs have been used for centuries to make refreshing drinks.
sentences.cn: 草药用于调制提神饮品已有好几个世纪了。

sentences.en: His work was deeply refreshing, and all of it shot through with humour.
sentences.cn: 他的作品令人耳目一新，充满幽默元素。

sentences.en: I find It'so refreshing to work with young people in this department.
sentences.cn: 我发现和这一部门的青年一起工作令人精神振奋.

sentences.en: I found a refreshing absence of industrial sprawl.
sentences.cn: 我发现了一处全无杂乱工业区踪影的、令人心旷神怡的地方.

sentences.en: It made a refreshing change to be taken seriously for once.
sentences.cn: 总算有一次受到认真对待，这变化真是令人耳目一新。

sentences.en: It made a refreshing change to talk to someone new.
sentences.cn: 和刚认识的人谈话感觉很新鲜。

sentences.en: It was refreshing to talk about themselves and their feelings with brutal honesty.
sentences.cn: 他们直言不讳地谈论自己和自己的感受，让人觉得耳目一新。

sentences.en: It's refreshing to hear somebody speaking common sense.
sentences.cn: 听到有人说话通情达理真是令人耳目一新。

sentences.en: The cucumbers are crisp and refreshing.
The water was cold and wonderfully refreshing.
What is refreshing is the author's easy, conversational style.
sentences.cn: 让人耳目一新的是作者轻松自如的会话式写作风格。
